Change the speed at which the player combines resources within a mixing bowl. Acts as a direct multiplier. Min: 0.0, Max: 10.0, Default: 1.0.
Features.EasyMixingBowl.IncludeAutomated: Apply the speed multiplier to powered mixing bowls, as well as manual mixing bowls.
Features.EasyMixingBowl.ModMenu.lblDescr: Provides an easier way for players to mix resources in a mixing bowl.
Features.EasyMixingBowl.ModMenu.lblSpeed: Determines the multiplier to apply to the speed of using the mixing bowl
Features.EasyMixingBowl.ModMenu.lbInclud: Determines whether to apply the speed multiplier to automated mixing bowls
Features.EasyMixingBowl.ModMenu.lbSticky: When active, the user will not need to keep the right-mouse button held down to keep the mixing bowl active
